Ms. BROWN. Mr. Speaker, I rise in support of H.R. 5457, the  Strengthening Agency Management and Oversight of Software Assets Act.

The SAMOSA Act is a straightforward, good-government bill that has  strong bipartisan support from members of the Oversight Committee.…

Mr. TIMMONS. Mr. Speaker, I move to suspend the rules and pass the  bill (H.R. 5457) to improve the visibility, accountability, and  oversight of agency software asset management practices, and for other  purposes, as amended.
